column1:
If set to "Website" the switcher works within one website only
If set to "Global" the switcher works between websites
column2:
If set to "Website" the switcher works within one website only
If set to "Global" the switcher works between websites

column1:
To disable Store Auto Switcher for administrative purposes use this key, e.g.
http://www.example.com/?_store_switcher_=key
column2:
To disable Store Auto Switcher for administrative purposes use this key, e.g.
http://www.example.com/?_store_switcher_=key

column1:
Exception URLs are relative URLs to your Store URL used mainly to disable Store Auto Switcher for payment processing gateways.
Enter one URL per line.
* means anything
Example:
/paypal/*
/twocheckout/*
column2:
Exception URLs are relative URLs to your Store URL used mainly to disable Store Auto Switcher for payment processing gateways.
Enter one URL per line.
* means anything
Example:
/paypal/*
/twocheckout/*

column1:
List of IPs for which Store Switcher should be disabled
Example:
123.123.123.123
123.123.*.*
column2:
List of IPs for which Store Switcher should be disabled
Example:
123.123.123.123
123.123.*.*

column1:
List of User Agents for which Store Switcher should be disabled. Enter one User Agent per line
Example:
gsa-crawler
Googlebot*
column2:
List of User Agents for which Store Switcher should be disabled. Enter one User Agent per line
Example:
gsa-crawler
Googlebot*
